Content: Evaluate the feasibility of decrypting the files.
If the ransomware group has provided contact information, establish contact.
Evaluate the options for paying the ransom, including the potential costs and risks of doing so. Determine if any insurance policies cover ransomware payments.
Continuously monitor systems for signs of reinfection or additional malicious activity related to the ransomware attack.
Offer assistance to users affected by the ransomware attack. Alternative ways of performing tasks may be necessary.
Restore Infected Systems according to BCP from backups.
